description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任福建省文学艺术界联合会党组书记、副主席，中国民间文艺家协会副主席。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who formerly served as the Party Group Secretary and Vice Chairman of the Fujian Federation of Literary and Art Circles, and as the Vice Chairman of the China Folk Literature and Art Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国福建省一个旧县名。
description.en: A former county name in Fujian Province, China.
A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 福建省文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 福建省文学艺术界联合会
en: Fujian Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党福建省委员会领导下的，由福建省文学艺术家协会、设区市文学艺术界联合会和全省性的产业文学艺术工作者联合会组成的人民团体。
description.en: A people's organization under the leadership of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China, composed of the Fujian Provincial Literary and Artists' Association, districted city federations of literary and art circles, and provincial-level industrial federations of literary and art workers.

en: China Folk Literature and Art Association

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族民间文艺家自愿组成的全国性专业组织。
description.en: A national professional organization voluntarily formed by folk literature and art workers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国福建省厦门市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Xiamen, Fujian Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization voluntarily formed by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族美术家组成的人民团体。
description.en: A people's organization composed of artists of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 曾是负责福建省文化事务的政府部门，现为福建省文化和旅游厅。
description.en: The former government department responsible for cultural affairs in Fujian Province, now the Fujian Provincial Department of Culture and Tourism.

en: Fujian Provincial Department of Radio and Television

description.zh-cn: 曾是负责福建省广播电视事务的政府部门，现为福建省广播电视局。
description.en: The former government department responsible for radio and television affairs in Fujian Province, now the Fujian Provincial Radio and Television Bureau.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议福建省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议福建省委员会
en: Fujian Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在福建省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Fujian Province.

en: Fujian Provincial Research Institute of Culture and History

description.zh-cn: 福建省人民政府设立的具有统战性、荣誉性的文史研究机构。
description.en: A united front and honorary institution for cultural and historical research established by the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 林德冠是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Lin Deguan is a political figure in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 福建省文学艺术界联合会
中国人民政治协商会议福建省委员会
